name: Bienvenido Granda
description:
'''Bienvenido Granda''', born '''Rosendo Bienvenido Granda Aguilera''' ([[Havana]], August 30, 1915 - [[Mexico City]], July 9, 1983), was a [[Cuba]]n vocalist, songwriter and musician, singing [[boleros]], [[son montuno]]s, [[guarachas]] and other Cuban rhythms. He was best known for having been the lead singer of the Cuban ensemble [[Sonora Matancera]] in the 1940s and 50s. He had a distinctive voice, relaxing and sensual. 

For sporting a prodigious [[mustache]], he was nicknamed ''El bigote que canta'' (The mustache that sings) and ''El bigote que canta con estilo'' (The mustache that sings with style).
